info.name: ELIXIR API
info.description: Elixir offers a powerful REST API that supports tokenization in the bitcoin's sidechain of Liquid. It brings powerful features to create a unique NFT standard technology for inter-operable skins.

item.name: API KEYS

header.description: Authentication token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

request.description: Functionality to get the key and userId

item.description:
The Elixir API usesAPI Keysto authenticate requests. Authentication to the API is performed with a key. Provide your API key on the token header.
All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will fail. API Requests without authentication will also fail.

item.name: GAMES

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

request.description: This endpoint list all uploaded games in Elixir

response.name: Retrieve games

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

response.name: Deposit Balance to Game

item.description: This page will help you get started with the upload & management of your games. Below there are all available endpoints.

item.name: ASSETS

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

request.description: This endpoint allows you to get a game's assets to Elixir

response.name: Get assets

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

request.description: This endpoint lets you disable an asset from Elixir. But it will remain tokenised in liquid

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

item.description: This page will help you get started with the management of your in-game assets from your Elixir games. You'll be up and running real quick!

response.name: Reward Balance To User
response.body:
{
    "type": "success",
    "userType": "session-not-claimed",
    "date": "2021-04-14",
    "msg": "Balance reward succesfuly applied to non registered user. Send reward URL for user to claim it.",
    "sessionId": "a865a439-cbda-435e-8e0a-14a882d9549f",
    "externId": "SatvivalUser123",
    "sessionBalance": 1,
    "reward": 1,
    "gameBalance": 988890,
    "rewardUrl": "https://beta.elixir.apprewards/a865a439-cbda-435e-8e0a-14a882d9549f"
}

response.name: Reward Balance Multiple Users
Reward Asset To User
Reward Assets Multiple Users
Substract Balance From User
response.body:
